titles.title: For the relief of Nancy P. Gilbert.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: 11/17/2004--Introduced. Promotes, posthumously, Nancy P. Gilbert, formerly of Marietta, Georgia, to the position of supervisory investigator in the Atlanta District Office of the Equal Employment Opportunity Commission, effective as of July 2, 2001. Prohibits this promotion from being taken into account for any pay or other personnel management purposes.
